mapper.select: SELECT seq, list, address, postaCode, main, contactMain_seq FROM address WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT seq, list, address, postaCode, main, contactMain_seq FROM address WHERE 1=1 and seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into address( seq, list, address, postaCode, main, contactMain_seq ) values ( #{seq}, #{list}, #{address}, #{postaCode}, #{main}, #{contactMain_seq} )
SELECT last_insert_id()
